sentences.en: A single room at the Astir Hotel costs £56 a night.
sentences.cn: 阿斯蒂尔酒店的单人间价格是56英镑一晚。

sentences.en: Authorities requisitioned hotel rooms to lodge more than 3,000 stranded Christmas vacationers.
sentences.cn: 当局征用旅馆房间安顿了3,000多名无处落脚的圣诞度假者。

sentences.en: Check us in at the hotel and wait for my call.
sentences.cn: 去宾馆替我们办理好入住手续，然后等我的电话。

sentences.en: Free room and board are provided for all hotel staff.
sentences.cn: 宾馆的所有员工都可享受免费膳宿。

sentences.en: He was happy to book into the Royal Pavilion Hotel.
sentences.cn: 他很高兴能入住圣庭苑酒店。

sentences.en: He was last seen striding maniacally to the hotel reception.
sentences.cn: 最后一次看见他的时候，他正发疯般地大跨步走向饭店的前台。

sentences.en: He was told to have out of the hotel.
sentences.cn: 有人通知他，让他离开他所住宿的旅馆。

sentences.en: I'll drive you back to your hotel later. It's no bother.
sentences.cn: 我一会儿会开车把你送回宾馆，举手之劳。

sentences.en: I'll ring the hotel. I'll tell them we'll check in tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我来给旅馆打电话，通知他们我们明天入住。

sentences.en: I’ve booked the flights and the hotel.
sentences.cn: 我已订好机票和酒店。

sentences.en: It was within easy walking distance of the hotel.
sentences.cn: 它离旅馆仅几步之遥。

sentences.en: The Atlantic coast is within sight of the hotel.
sentences.cn: 从宾馆可以看见大西洋海岸。

sentences.en: The guide book contains a short write-up of each hotel.
sentences.cn: 指南上有对每个饭店的简评。

sentences.en: The hotel is now open to guests.
sentences.cn: 这个旅馆现在已向客人开放。

sentences.en: The hotel is set plumb in the middle of the high street.
sentences.cn: 宾馆正好坐落在商街的中段。

sentences.en: The least his hotel could do is provide a little privacy.
sentences.cn: 他的酒店至少应该提供一点隐私保护。

sentences.en: The two hotel-restaurants are attractive bases from which to explore southeast Tuscany.
sentences.cn: 对于去托斯卡纳东南部探险的人们来说，这两家酒店是很有吸引力的驻扎地。

sentences.en: We’ll be staying at the Hotel Ibis.
sentences.cn: 我们将住在宜必思酒店。

sentences.en: What's he sucking around the hotel for?
sentences.cn: 他老在旅馆这儿转悠，想要干什么?

sentences.en: You can upgrade from self-catering accommodation to a hotel.
sentences.cn: 您可以将自理膳食旅店升级为酒店。

phrases.tran_cn: 精品酒店，精品饭店；精品旅馆
世纪酒店（电影名称，酒店名称）

trans.tran_en: a building where people pay to stay and eat meals
a building where people pay to stay and eat meals
